attributes.action: Force David Cameron and his government to resign.
attributes.additional_details: After the appalling way David Cameron has run our country penalising the disabled and sick, cutting jobs, letting our industries die and allowing the new generation to have no hope of a job or career by opening the doors to immigrant workers who accept less wages. Him and the government need to go. The exit from Europe is just the first step to repairing our great nation. Next we need to close the doors and deal with immigration. Then we need to get manufacturing up and running again.
attributes.background:
Accepted mass immigration killing job prospects, took homes and crushed NHS.
Cut help and benefit to the most vulnerable in society.
Allowed British manufacturers and businesses to fold.
Allowed Political correctness to rule over logic.
Ignored the British people (working class/middle class)

rejection.details: The resignation of any minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individuals concerned.
